name: SpaceDog
description:
A specially trained dog suddenly found herself alone at the helm of a spacecraft and now she will have to save people scattered in outer space who were supposed to study the planet, but now their life is in the paws of a space dog.

"SpaceDog" is a 2D arcade game about open space, where the player controls a spaceship and collects scattered astronauts, refueling along the way and continuing his flight, and most importantly - do not forget to properly land the ship on the surface of the earth at the end!

Game Features:
  • Nice visual style
  • Challenging levels
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Family friendly
